column2: Q1: How often do you read the news?
column3: Q2: Would you say you are aware of current events?
column4: Q3: Describe your engagement with news media.
column5: Q4. Is there anything you would like to change in your media consumption habits?
column6: Start playing game (classic). Write down any questions asked.
column7: Q5. (Check-in) How was that? Were there any surprises?
column8: Explain advanced game modes. Write down any questions asked. Let user choose one (or more) to play.
column9: Q6. How was that? Were there any surprises? Did the advanced feature enhance your experience?
column10: Q7. What, if anything, did you learn? Do you feel more aware of current events than you did previously?
column11: Q8. Would you continue to play this game?
column12: Q9. Was the interface intuitive? Would you have felt comfortable navigating it without me present?
column13: Q10. What would you like to see added/changed/removed? What improvements can be made?
Automatically open up article list, show which word's articles are showing (on scoreboard), add tutorial
